short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bigg Boss Tamil Vote is an online poll conducted for Bigg Boss Tamil. The contestant with the least vote will be eliminated

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bigg Boss Tamil Vote by TamilGlitz is a public opinion in related to Elimination of contestants participating in Bigg Boss Tamil Season 2. The Voting for Bigg Boss Tamil happens on the basis of the nomination that happens every Monday. People can vote here. Bigg Boss Tamil Vote is conducted every week from Monday to Friday.
